vmassol - (17:28): jvelociter: I'm adding some small improvements to the tests  
vmassol - (17:29): I thought the import was now staying on the same page after you delete a package  
vmassol - (17:29): but apparently it's not the case  
vmassol - (17:29): is that something you're working on fixing?  
vmassol - (17:29): (I thought you had fixed it actually)  
jvelociter - (17:35): vmassol: no I must admit I forgot. Need to fix it indeed  
jvelociter - (17:35): for 2.2.2  
vmassol - (17:35): ok

CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:28): Anyone know why hudson agent 1 is turned off?  
vmassol - (19:28): let me restart hudson  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:33): Thanks. I gather it will shut down when building is finished.  
vmassol - (19:42): done  
CalebJamesDeLisl - (19:43): Yes, thanks. I can now see how my selenium test runs when not running locally.
